这款游戏早就失去了2016年时的乐趣，他给我的青春带来了无限的快乐，但是，那也只是我的青春，现在的守望先锋，正如那句台词，这个世界不再需要英雄了。资本主义的白匪凌驾于之上，再也没有乐趣了
Пришлось скачать и запустить эту zaloopу что бы оставить отзыв. Игра 2016 г. стала доступна в стиме, СПАСИБО !!! Получайте фитбек от комьюнити. 👉🤡👈
你说的对，但是《守望先锋归来》是由动视暴雪自主研发的一款全新第一人称射击游戏。我现在每玩一周守望先锋都能赚60金币，每个月差不多240金币的收入，也就是现实生活中每个月7.2元的收入水平，换算过来31周，也就是7个月，我就可以买一个守望先锋的普通金皮，虽然守望先锋1只要1000金币升级还给箱子可以有几率开出，但是已经超越了中国绝大多数人(包括你)的水平，这便是守望先锋给我的骄傲的资本。
守望先锋是好游戏，但暴雪真不是个东西

Скачал игру, чтобы наконец оставить негативную оценку. Никто никогда не вернётся во времена первой части, потому старое руководство ушло. Спасибо за хорошие воспоминания Джефф Каплан и прошлая команда разработчиков, вы сделали в своё время игру года для всех людей. Сейчас это попса, которая паразитирует на успехе старой игры и берёт все наглые способы по отжатию денег из современных представителей жанра батл рояль.

welp, time to write a long review.
now, when i started playing overwatch in 2017, the game was really fun. it had a wide roster of (fairly) balanced characters, various gamemodes, and great opportunities to spend time with yer friends online, that is, if they wanted to play with you. The hours i spent in the training range alone are far beyond any other game i played at that time.
when the game slowly died, some other friends got it, and honestly, the days, weeks before the game got shut down were the most fun to me, just a great time in a game that wasn't focused on it's existence, but on it's progression. Finding out cool ways to deal with the current situation was part of the fun. 
However, when it was replaced with this utter bullshit, and i cannot express this any nicer, it is truly the worst, the game went down the gutter so fast, it didn't stop at the drain, it went into the downpour, just to sink in the canals, until it was released into the ocean, where it sunk down to the ocean grounds. every third week i check in to see if something has improved, only to find another layer of fossils over it, that's burying the game, as well as it's dignity even further in.

And to see my fellow _gamers_ having the same view on it, it is even more depressing that this utter baffoonery of a company just doesn't give in. They don't compromise, they don't improve, they just keep digging their own grave.

But thank god it's on steam, where there's reviews, so that Blizzard can finally reap what they have sown.

Highly recommend.
Overwatch is fast-paced, faster than fast. A core gameplay-loop that after almost 3000 hours I've still yet to fully explore. I love it. I love the characters, the art, the world, the biggest shame is that Activision Execs refused to allow the Devs to turn it into everything they believed it could be. 
But I've tried other stuff, Valorant, Fortnite, so on, and I probably have more complaints about Overwatch than most people, I still come back to Overwatch. Its just really good. Love-hate relationship, yes. I take breaks, play when its fun, play to enjoy it.

There's a lot I don't like about modern gaming, battlepasses, micro(more macro)-transactions, etc. 
Overwatch has these things, and I understand some people find that unjustifiable, sometimes I agree (Valorant's £80+ bundles...), I buy the battlepass here because I genuinely don't mind putting a couple quid into a game I enjoy. But you don't have to.

Story-mode. I've yet to play, I've heard good things. It is disingenuous to have it wrapped in a bundle with coins to buy the battlepass, for people other than myself who don't want the battlepass, ouch, that is bullshit. Its gonna be 6+ months until we get more story missions, that doesn't feel great. Don't buy it if its not for you, the core of Overwatch is free, suck it dry for all its worth without giving anything to ActiBlizz.
